actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide duty-free treatment for certain log forwarders used as motor vehicles for the transport of goods.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide duty-free treatment for certain log forwarders with cranes, designed for off-highway use and certain parts of log forwarders. Applies certain staged rate reductions to such items.

titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide duty-free treatment for certain log forwarders used as motor vehicles for the transport of goods.
